title: Über
metaDescription: Learn to automate blog cover image creation using Playwright, GPT-4, and Midjourney for SEO.

body.raw:
Hey there! 👋 I'm [Felix Vemmer](https://twitter.com/felixvemmer?ref=felixvemmer.com), the person behind this blog. Here, you'll find straight-to-the-point insights and practical advice on Python, TypeScript, and all things full-stack.

If you're a fellow developer, you're in the right place. Welcome aboard!

If you wanna say hi, send me a DM on [Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/felixvemmer?ref=felixvemmer.com) or an email to [felix.vemmer@gmail.com](mailto:felix.vemmer@gmail.com).

### My Journey

Initially, I had no formal coding education. My programming journey began with Python, a language that I found incredibly practical for data scraping and machine learning projects. This early work ignited a spark and quickly led me to evolve into a data engineer role.

As I delved further into the tech industry, the rise of Web3 caught my attention, pushing me to explore full-stack development and understand the intricacies of building products from scratch. This exploration began with Flask, moved on to Django, passed through Vue, and finally landed me in the welcoming arms of Next.js.

### My Mission

As an Indiepreneur, I've always believed in the power of sharing and the magic that happens when we help one another grow. My mission with this blog is not just to share my insights and experiences, but also to create a community of like-minded enthusiasts who are passionate about Python, TypeScript, and full-stack technologies.

In my posts, you will find a mix of practical tutorials, thought-provoking insights, and discussions on the latest trends and innovations in the field. My hope is that this blog will serve as a valuable resource for both beginners who are just starting out and seasoned programmers looking for a fresh perspective.

I welcome you to join me on this journey, as we delve deeper into the world of Python, TypeScript, and full-stack technologies. Let's learn, grow, and code together!

---

{/* ### Stay Connected */}

{/* Ready to delve deeper into the world of Python, TypeScript, full-stack? I'd love to have you join our developer community! By signing up, you'll receive regular updates, get access to insightful articles, and engage in thought-provoking discussions. */}

{/* Just pop your email into the subscription box below, and you'll be all set! Let's continue this tech adventure together. */}

Happy coding!

Felix

title: Consulting Services
metaDescription: Learn about the consulting services I offer, including full-stack development, data & AI services, and business process automation & SEO.

body.raw:
# Consulting Services

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  width={2000}
  height={1335}
  alt="Felix Vemmer Consulting Servies"
  src="/pages/consulting-services/photo-1454165804606-c3d57bc86b40.jpeg"
/>

I am a self-taught programmer with a CEMS Master in International Management. Having both a business and deep technical understanding allows me to easily communicate complex technical ideas with business stakeholders.

## What can I help you with? 💪

### ⚔️ Full-Stack Development

Build and ship the next modern frontend application to power your individual idea.

**Languages I speak:**

Typescript, CSS, HTML

**Frameworks & Libraries Expertise:**

- Next.js / Next14
- Tailwind CSS & UI / Daisy UI / ShadcnUI
- React Hook Form
- Tanstack Table
- Clerk Auth
- Drizzle ORM
- Directus & Strapi CMS

### 🤖 Data & AI Services

Derive better insights and build new data products with a scalable data warehouse and custom data pipelines.

**Languages I speak:**

Python, SQL, Prompt Engineering

**Frameworks & Libraries Expertise:**

- Langchain
- Postgres: Neon / Supabase
- DBT
- Pandas
- Modal
- Superset
- Airbyte
- Great Expectations
- FasAPI

### 📢 Business Process Automation & SEO

Deploy automation scripts to optimize operations and leverage SEO strategies to amplify your online reach.

**Tools:**

- Ahrefs
- Google Search Console
- Google Tag Manager
- Posthog
- Linear
- Pipedream

## Interested in Working together? 🗓️

Send me an email to [felix.vemmer@gmail.com](mailto:felix.vemmer@gmail.com) or book a meeting:

<CalCom />

title: Hardware I use in 2024
metaDescription: Explore the tech hardware that powers my daily life in 2024. Get insights into my laptop, monitor, keyboard, mouse, and more that make my life efficient.

body.raw:
# Hardware I Use: A Glimpse into My Tech Setup

In this "My Personal Tech Gear" section, I'm excited to give you a tour of the tech hardware that powers my everyday life. You'll get an inside look at the keyboards, phone chargers, and other essential items that I rely on daily. Join me as we explore these everyday tech heroes that make life just a little bit easier and a whole lot more efficient.

## My Laptop

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'MacBook Pro Apple M2 Pro 14.2"',
    price: '2.799,00€',
    rating: 4.7,
    reviewCount: 166,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/-/en/MNW83D-A/dp/B0BSHHBH3N?crid=2ZSH50FISFTJO&keywords=apple+macbook+pro+m2&qid=1688237944&s=computers&sprefix=apple+macbook+pro+m2%2Ccomputers%2C96&sr=1-3&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=134bd667108ab16e47c9c2a39a1662db&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/61fd2oCrvyL._AC_SL1500_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'MacBook Pro Apple M2 Pro 14.2"',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Love the all day battery life, super good performance, excellent display, speakers, trackpad and
  keyboard. A blast to work with even when travelling or working remotely. Also the value and price
  lasts for quite some time so I see it as a long-term investment.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👎 Cons">
  Super super pricy. If someone steals it or you spill water over it it's game over. Apart from that
  excellent machine.
</Callout>

## My Monitor

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Dell UltraSharp 40" WUHD Monitor',
    price: '1.432,79€',
    rating: 4.4,
    reviewCount: 32,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/dp/B08VH5JFXF?th=1&psc=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=db8dd8d81bde08912f6829eb40641b6a&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/61PNf3qedPL._AC_SL1200_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'Dell UltraSharp 40" WUHD Monitor',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Excellent monitor that was recommended to me by a friend. The 5k resolution display is a joy to
  work with. Fits three windows easily, so perfect for web development. Also comes with a USB-C Port
  so you can connect and charge your USB-C compatible laptop with one single cable.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👎 Cons">
  For some reason the monitor does not fall asleep. So at the end of the day I need to power it off.
</Callout>

## My Keyboard

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Apple Magic Keyboard with Touch ID',
    price: '159.00€',
    rating: 4.7,
    reviewCount: 1069,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/-/en/Apple-Magic-Keyboard-Touch-Chip/dp/B09BRGW5KV?crid=1HWG4XL7DW43E&keywords=apple+keyboard&qid=1688238775&s=computers&sprefix=apple+keyboar%2Ccomputers%2C109&sr=1-9&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=690e3b3935e12fa5ab2c5ee47d4a406e&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/71I8hC4yHQL._AC_SL1500_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'Apple Magic Keyboard with Touch ID',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Super convenient to authenticate with TouchID if you're locked into the apple ecosystem. Battery
  life is fantastic and typing experience great if you like the Mac style typing experience.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👎 Cons">
  Quite pricy for a simple keyboard, as most of the Apple products.
</Callout>

## My Mouse

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Logitech MX Master 3S',
    price: '59.99€',
    rating: 4.6,
    reviewCount: 6570,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/dp/B07W6H4R4G?th=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=77d87bee5d902a6feb5ddd0d97b61e1c&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/61TU7cMHepL._AC_SL1500_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'Logitech MX Master 3S',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Amazing ergonomic and just feels great in your hands. Perfectly tuned for Mac users (e.g. mission
  control, swiping etc.).
</Callout>

## My Charger

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Anker 3-in-1 Cube with MagSafe',
    price: '154,99€',
    rating: 5,
    reviewCount: 19,
    href: 'https://www.anker.com/eu-de/products/y1811?variant=43451250999459',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/HQ3E2_AV1.jpeg',
    imageAlt: 'Anker 3-in-1 Cube with MagSafe',
    buttonLabel: "View on Anker's Website",
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Perfect for traveling and just super convenient to charge all three devices with no cables.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👎 Cons">
  Magnetic field not super strong if you use a charging case. Never paid so much money for a phone
  charger.
</Callout>

## My Light

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'XIAOMI Mi Computer Monitor Light Bar',
    price: '47,34€',
    rating: 4.9,
    reviewCount: 85,
    href: 'https://www.banggood.com/XIAOMI-Mi-Computer-Monitor-Light-Bar-2_4GHz-wireless-Remote-Control-No-Screen-Reflection-Eyes-Protection-Ra95-USB-Lamp-Display-Hanging-Light-p-1983555.html?imageAb=2&utm_design=18&utm_click=6&utm_email=1684520921_3671_6&utm_source=emarsys&utm_medium=OrderConfirmReceipt&utm_campaign=trigger-logistics&utm_content=leander&sc_src=email_4320992&sc_eh=22761497749dcbbf1&sc_llid=11893603&sc_lid=180720778&sc_uid=vcK7dvB195&akmClientCountry=DE&a=1688239946.1302&cur_warehouse=CN&DCC=DE&currency=EUR&akmClientCountry=DE',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/2573677-n0.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'XIAOMI Mi Computer Monitor Light Bar',
    buttonLabel: "View on Banggood's Website",
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Perfect for longer coding nights. No reflection from the monitor and neat looking wireless control
  for switching light warmth and intensity.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👎 Cons">
  Hardly fits on big screens like the one, I recommended above, but it just barely works, although
  on smaller monitors the fit is probably even better.
</Callout>

## My Chair

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Sedus se:do Pro Light Swivel Chair',
    price: '393,69€',
    rating: 4.3,
    reviewCount: 598,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/Sedus-Membrane-Adjustable-Armrests-Backrest/dp/B085GNPT98?keywords=sedus%2Bpro&qid=1688240169&sr=8-1-spons&sp_csd=d2lkZ2V0TmFtZT1zcF9hdGY&th=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=35985a2654de0a5b1e1a6bc4730cf8e5&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',

/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  N26 actually had these in their offices. I liked them so much when I quit so I decided to get one
  of them myself. Super comfortable, really good quality and love the minimalist design.
</Callout>

title: Tech Stack 2024
metaDescription: Dive straight into the heart of my development process in this quick tour of my personal tech stack as of 2024.

body.raw:
# Tech Stack 2024

Dive straight into the heart of my development process in this quick tour of my personal tech stack as of 2024. Discover the languages, frameworks, and tools I use to bring ideas to life. Ready for a sneak peek into my digital toolkit? Let's get started!

### Frontend Framework: Next JS 13

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/LightMode_CreateNextApp.png"
  alt="Frontend Framework: Next JS 13"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🖥️">
  **Why:** Next.js provides a production-ready framework that's backed by a thriving community and a
  wealth of supportive content. It's the easiest way to build fast, SEO-optimized full-stack
  applications with React, offering the latest features such as Server Components.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🏃">
  **Runner Up:** [Svelte Kit](https://kit.svelte.dev/?ref=felixvemmer.com)
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/why-next-js" />

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Next.js 13 Docs"
  href="https://nextjs.org/docs?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Frontend Deployment: Vercel

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-06-30-at-14.06.47@2x.png"
  alt="Frontend Deployment: Vercel"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="⚙️">
  **Why:** Vercel provides the best developer experience, offering features like deployment
  previews, collaboration through comments, easy management of environment variables, and a
  user-friendly CLI. It's the top choice for developers seeking an efficient, seamless process for
  building and deploying modern websites and applications.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Vercel Deployment Starter"
  href="https://vercel.com/new?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Python Deployment: Modal

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.13.52@2x.png"
  alt="Python Deployment: Modal"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🐍">
  **Why:** With just a simple decorator, Modal can turn any function into a web-hook or serverless
  function. Coupled with great logs and easy debugging, it provides an overall superb developer
  experience. The super-helpful community, excellent documentation, and best real-world use examples
  further contribute to making Modal an essential tool for modern development.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Modal Docs"
  href="https://modal.com/docs/guide?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### General Deployment/Self Hosting: Railway

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.16.09@2x.png"
  alt="General Deployment/Self Hosting: Railway"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🚀">
  **Why:** Railway offers an extensive collection of useful templates for popular open-source
  products and frameworks. With out-of-the-box features like CI/CD integration with GitHub,
  streamlined management of environment variables, and secure URLs complete with SSL certificates,
  Railway simplifies the deployment process. It's designed to enhance and streamline your
  development experience, providing everything you need to easily deploy software.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Railway Docs"
  href="https://railway.app/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Relational DB Provider: Neon

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-21.59.20@2x.png"
  alt="Relational DB Provider: Neon"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🐘">
  **Why:** Database branching is not only a time-saver but also a powerful tool for testing any
  database change with real production data. Combined with serverless Postgres, which scales
  efficiently and ensures that you only pay for what you use, these features make database
  management more accessible and cost-effective than ever before.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🏃">
  **Runner Up:** [Supabase](https://supabase.com/?ref=felixvemmer.com)
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Neon Docs"
  href="https://neon.tech/docs/introduction?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Payment Processing: Lemon Squeezy

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.00.28@2x.png"
  alt="Payment Processing: Lemon Squeezy"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="💸">
  **Why:** As a merchant of record, LemonSqueezy takes care of the tax compliance burden, allowing
  me to focus on building the product. Plus, with standout features like the affiliate hub and email
  marketing, LemonSqueezy stands out as my preferred payment processor.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🏃">
  **Runner Up:** [Stripe](https://stripe.com/en-de?ref=felixvemmer.com)
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/lemon-squeezy-nextjs-payment-integration-guide" />

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Lemon Squeezy Docs"
  href="https://www.lemonsqueezy.com/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Analytics: PostHog

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.02.16@2x.png"
  alt="Analytics: PostHog"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🦔">
  **Why:** PostHog is the all-in-one analytics solution that effortlessly stitches together
  identified and anonymous users across sessions, delivering core product metrics with minimal
  setup. It's my preferred solution for making data-driven decisions, enabling me to continuously
  enhance and improve products based on accurate and insightful data.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🏃">
  **Runner Up:** [Plausible.io](https://plausible.io/?ref=felixvemmer.com)
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/unlocking-power-of-data-with-posthog-for-saas-success" />

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Posthog Docs"
  href="https://www.felixvemmer.com/tech-stack/Post%20Hog%20Docs"
/>

### Customer Support: Plain

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.10.22@2x.png"
  alt="Customer Support: Plain"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="💬">
  **Why:** Plain is incredibly easy to integrate with native React components, offering an amazing
  API to build and display the customer data that matters most to you. Its simplicity and
  functionality make it an essential tool for offering the best customer support.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Plain Docs"
  href="https://www.plain.com/docs?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Feature Requests: Canny.io

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.11.36@2x.png"
  alt="Feature Requests: Canny.io"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="⭐">
  **Why:** Canny is the go-to solution for easy and organized feature requests, offering a simple UI
  and setup. With the single sign-on feature, customers can effortlessly upvote or add new feature
  requests without the need to create a new account. It streamlines the process of gathering and
  managing feedback, making it a valuable tool for enhancing your product.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Canny Landing Page"
  href="https://canny.io/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Authentication: Clerk.dev

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.03.57@2x.png"
  alt="Authentication: Clerk.dev"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🔒">
  **Why:** Clerk.dev delivers super-fast authentication on the edge, providing an excellent
  developer experience with an array of amazing features. These include JWT Templates, Custom
  Session Tokens, User Impersonation, and Fully Customizable Components. It's a comprehensive
  solution designed to meet modern authentication needs with efficiency and flexibility.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🏃">
  **Runner Up:** [Supabase
  Authentication](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth?ref=felixvemmer.com)
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/supabase-vs-clerk-dev-user-authentication-comparison" />

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Clerk Docs"
  href="https://clerk.com/docs?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Styling: Tailwind CSS & Tailwind UI

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-07-01-at-15.21.20@2x.png"
  alt="Styling: Tailwind CSS & Tailwind UI"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🎨">
  **Why:** Tailwind CSS offers utility-first styling for rapid, responsive design, while Tailwind UI
  provides a rich set of well-crafted components. Together, they enable developers to create
  professional-grade websites with less effort, offering great customization and efficiency. It's an
  appealing choice for those looking to streamline their design process without sacrificing quality.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="TailwindCSS Docs"
  href="https://tailwindcss.com/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### UI Libraries:

#### Shadcn/UI

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-07-01-at-15.22.35@2x.png"
  alt="UI Libraries: Shadcn/UI"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🧱">
  **Why:** Shadcn UI offers beautifully designed, accessible components that can be easily copied
  and pasted into your apps, with the added flexibility of customization. Not only are these
  components open source, but they also provide guidance on building super modular and reusable
  components. It's an ideal solution for developers seeking both aesthetic appeal and educational
  value in their design process.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="shadcn/ui Docs"
  href="https://ui.shadcn.com/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

#### Daisy UI

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-19.22.36@2x.png"
  alt="Daisy UI"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🎨">
  **Why:** DaisyUI provides beautiful color palettes and well-crafted pre-designed components,
  including avatars, inputs, and more. With its user-friendly interface, it's super easy to switch
  and customize themes, allowing for creative flexibility and a streamlined design process. It's an
  appealing choice for developers seeking both aesthetic quality and ease of use.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="dasiyUI Docs"
  href="https://daisyui.com/docs/install/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Data Validation: Zod

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.19.11@2x.png"
  alt="Data Validation: Zod"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🔍">
  **Why:** Zod offers a TypeScript-first approach to schema declaration and validation, providing an
  intuitive and type-safe way to ensure data integrity. With comprehensive error messages and
  effortless integration with popular frameworks, it simplifies the validation process.
</Callout>

<LinkButton className="mb-12 mt-2" label="Zod Docs" href="https://zod.dev/?ref=felixvemmer.com" />

### Form Library: React-Hook-Form

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-06-30-at-14.08.31@2x.png"
  alt="Form Library: React-Hook-Form"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="📝">
  **Why:** Zod's integration with libraries like React Hook Form through the use of resolvers offers
  a seamless experience for form validation. By combining Zod's type-safe schema validation with the
  efficiency of custom resolvers, developers can create robust and maintainable forms with ease.
  This integration simplifies complex validation requirements, making it a go-to solution for those
  aiming to enhance both development speed and product reliability.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Form Builder Demo"
  href="https://react-hook-form.com/form-builder?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Form Inputs: React Select

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-19.24.50@2x.png"
  alt="Form Inputs: React Select"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🤏">
  **Why:** React Select is the easiest way to create flexible and customizable dropdown select menus
  in your React applications. With its rich set of features, including multi-select, search
  functionality, and easy theming, it provides a streamlined user experience without sacrificing
  style or functionality. It's an ideal choice for developers seeking to implement sophisticated
  select controls with minimal effort.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="React Select Docs"
  href="https://react-select.com/home?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Table Library: TanStack Table

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-06-30-at-14.10.35@2x.png"
  alt="Table Library: TanStack Table"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="📄">
  **Why:** React Table is a highly flexible and customizable library for building and managing
  tables in React applications. With features like sorting, filtering, pagination, and resizable
  columns, it provides an efficient way to handle large datasets without compromising performance.
  It's an excellent choice for developers who need to create interactive and dynamic tables with
  ease, offering both functionality and adaptability in one package.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Tanstack Table Docs"
  href="https://tanstack.com/table/v8/docs/guide/introduction?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### ORM: Drizzle-ORM & Drizzle Kit

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-07-01-at-15.26.19@2x.png"
  alt="ORM: Drizzle-ORM & Drizzle Kit"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🤯">
  **Why:** Drizzle stands out as the best ORM for interacting with any relational database, offering
  a seamless experience with features like Drizzle Kit for pushing and migrating changes, and
  Drizzle Studio for data editing. With its SQL-like syntax and full type-safety for returned data,
  it provides the best devloper experience for anyone interacting with databases.
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/drizzle-orm-boosting-developer-productivity" />

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Drizzle Landing Page"
  href="https://orm.drizzle.team/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### LLMs: Vercel AI SDK

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-07-01-at-15.28.40@2x.png"
  alt="LLMs: Vercel AI SDK"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🤖">
  **Why:** Vercel AI SDK is the easiest way to integrate AI features from LLMs, providing superb
  user experiences through streaming responses over the Vercel edge network. By enabling real-time
  interaction and responsiveness, it offers a seamless way to enhance applications with cutting-edge
  AI capabilities.
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/streaming-objects-vercel-ai-sdk-guide" />

<LinkButton className="mb-12 mt-2" label="Vercel AI SDK Docs" href="https://sdk.vercel.ai/docs" />

### Rate Limiting: Upstash

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.08.15@2x.png"
  alt="Rate Limiting: Upstash"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="✋">
  **Why:** The Upstash Rate Limiting SDK provides an effortless solution for safeguarding your
  application from DDOS attacks and preventing the abuse or overwhelming of resources. It's a
  streamlined approach to security that emphasizes both reliability and simplicity, making it a top
  choice for maintaining optimal performance.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="ratelimit GitHub Repo"
  href="https://github.com/upstash/ratelimit?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

title: About
metaDescription: Learn to automate blog cover image creation using Playwright, GPT-4, and Midjourney for SEO.

body.raw:
Hey there! 👋 I'm [Felix Vemmer](https://twitter.com/felixvemmer?ref=felixvemmer.com), the person behind this blog. Here, you'll find straight-to-the-point insights and practical advice on Python, TypeScript, and all things full-stack.

If you're a fellow developer, you're in the right place. Welcome aboard!

If you wanna say hi, send me a DM on [Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/felixvemmer?ref=felixvemmer.com) or an email to [felix.vemmer@gmail.com](mailto:felix.vemmer@gmail.com).

### My Journey

Initially, I had no formal coding education. My programming journey began with Python, a language that I found incredibly practical for data scraping and machine learning projects. This early work ignited a spark and quickly led me to evolve into a data engineer role.

As I delved further into the tech industry, the rise of Web3 caught my attention, pushing me to explore full-stack development and understand the intricacies of building products from scratch. This exploration began with Flask, moved on to Django, passed through Vue, and finally landed me in the welcoming arms of Next.js.

### My Mission

As an Indiepreneur, I've always believed in the power of sharing and the magic that happens when we help one another grow. My mission with this blog is not just to share my insights and experiences, but also to create a community of like-minded enthusiasts who are passionate about Python, TypeScript, and full-stack technologies.

In my posts, you will find a mix of practical tutorials, thought-provoking insights, and discussions on the latest trends and innovations in the field. My hope is that this blog will serve as a valuable resource for both beginners who are just starting out and seasoned programmers looking for a fresh perspective.

I welcome you to join me on this journey, as we delve deeper into the world of Python, TypeScript, and full-stack technologies. Let's learn, grow, and code together!

---

{/* ### Stay Connected */}

{/* Ready to delve deeper into the world of Python, TypeScript, full-stack? I'd love to have you join our developer community! By signing up, you'll receive regular updates, get access to insightful articles, and engage in thought-provoking discussions. */}

{/* Just pop your email into the subscription box below, and you'll be all set! Let's continue this tech adventure together. */}

Happy coding!

Felix

title: Consulting Services
metaDescription: Learn about the consulting services I offer, including full-stack development, data & AI services, and business process automation & SEO.

body.raw:
# Consulting Services

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  width={2000}
  height={1335}
  alt="Felix Vemmer Consulting Servies"
  src="/pages/consulting-services/photo-1454165804606-c3d57bc86b40.jpeg"
/>

I am a self-taught programmer with a CEMS Master in International Management. Having both a business and deep technical understanding allows me to easily communicate complex technical ideas with business stakeholders.

## What can I help you with? 💪

### ⚔️ Full-Stack Development

Build and ship the next modern frontend application to power your individual idea.

**Languages I speak:**

Typescript, CSS, HTML

**Frameworks & Libraries Expertise:**

- Next.js / Next13
- Tailwind CSS & UI / Daisy UI / ShadcnUI
- React Hook Form
- Tanstack Table
- Clerk Auth
- Drizzle ORM
- Directus & Strapi CMS

### 🤖 Data & AI Services

Derive better insights and build new data products with a scalable data warehouse and custom data pipelines.

**Languages I speak:**

Python, SQL, Prompt Engineering

**Frameworks & Libraries Expertise:**

- Langchain
- Postgres: Neon / Supabase
- DBT
- Pandas
- Modal
- Superset
- Airbyte
- Great Expectations
- FasAPI

### 📢 Business Process Automation & SEO

Deploy automation scripts to optimize operations and leverage SEO strategies to amplify your online reach.

**Tools:**

- Ahrefs
- Google Search Console
- Google Tag Manager
- Posthog
- Linear
- Pipedream

## Interested in Working together? 🗓️

Send me an email to [felix.vemmer@gmail.com](mailto:felix.vemmer@gmail.com) or book a meeting:

<CalCom />

title: Hardware I use in 2023
metaDescription: Explore the tech hardware that powers my daily life in 2023. Get insights into my laptop, monitor, keyboard, mouse, and more that make my life efficient.

body.raw:
# Hardware I Use: A Glimpse into My Tech Setup

In this "My Personal Tech Gear" section, I'm excited to give you a tour of the tech hardware that powers my everyday life. You'll get an inside look at the keyboards, phone chargers, and other essential items that I rely on daily. Join me as we explore these everyday tech heroes that make life just a little bit easier and a whole lot more efficient.

## My Laptop

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'MacBook Pro Apple M2 Pro 14.2"',
    price: '2.799,00€',
    rating: 4.7,
    reviewCount: 166,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/-/en/MNW83D-A/dp/B0BSHHBH3N?crid=2ZSH50FISFTJO&keywords=apple+macbook+pro+m2&qid=1688237944&s=computers&sprefix=apple+macbook+pro+m2%2Ccomputers%2C96&sr=1-3&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=134bd667108ab16e47c9c2a39a1662db&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/61fd2oCrvyL._AC_SL1500_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'MacBook Pro Apple M2 Pro 14.2"',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Love the all day battery life, super good performance, excellent display, speakers, trackpad and
  keyboard. A blast to work with even when travelling or working remotely. Also the value and price
  lasts for quite some time so I see it as a long-term investment.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👎 Cons">
  Super super pricy. If someone steals it or you spill water over it it's game over. Apart from that
  excellent machine.
</Callout>

## My Monitor

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Dell UltraSharp 40" WUHD Monitor',
    price: '1.432,79€',
    rating: 4.4,
    reviewCount: 32,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/dp/B08VH5JFXF?th=1&psc=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=db8dd8d81bde08912f6829eb40641b6a&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/61PNf3qedPL._AC_SL1200_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'Dell UltraSharp 40" WUHD Monitor',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Excellent monitor that was recommended to me by a friend. The 5k resolution display is a joy to
  work with. Fits three windows easily, so perfect for web development. Also comes with a USB-C Port
  so you can connect and charge your USB-C compatible laptop with one single cable.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👎 Cons">
  For some reason the monitor does not fall asleep. So at the end of the day I need to power it off.
</Callout>

## My Keyboard

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Apple Magic Keyboard with Touch ID',
    price: '159.00€',
    rating: 4.7,
    reviewCount: 1069,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/-/en/Apple-Magic-Keyboard-Touch-Chip/dp/B09BRGW5KV?crid=1HWG4XL7DW43E&keywords=apple+keyboard&qid=1688238775&s=computers&sprefix=apple+keyboar%2Ccomputers%2C109&sr=1-9&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=690e3b3935e12fa5ab2c5ee47d4a406e&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/71I8hC4yHQL._AC_SL1500_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'Apple Magic Keyboard with Touch ID',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Super convenient to authenticate with TouchID if you're locked into the apple ecosystem. Battery
  life is fantastic and typing experience great if you like the Mac style typing experience.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👎 Cons">
  Quite pricy for a simple keyboard, as most of the Apple products.
</Callout>

## My Mouse

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Logitech MX Master 3S',
    price: '59.99€',
    rating: 4.6,
    reviewCount: 6570,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/dp/B07W6H4R4G?th=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=77d87bee5d902a6feb5ddd0d97b61e1c&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/61TU7cMHepL._AC_SL1500_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'Logitech MX Master 3S',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Amazing ergonomic and just feels great in your hands. Perfectly tuned for Mac users (e.g. mission
  control, swiping etc.).
</Callout>

## My Charger

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Anker 3-in-1 Cube with MagSafe',
    price: '154,99€',
    rating: 5,
    reviewCount: 19,
    href: 'https://www.anker.com/eu-de/products/y1811?variant=43451250999459',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/HQ3E2_AV1.jpeg',
    imageAlt: 'Anker 3-in-1 Cube with MagSafe',
    buttonLabel: "View on Anker's Website",
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Perfect for traveling and just super convenient to charge all three devices with no cables.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👎 Cons">
  Magnetic field not super strong if you use a charging case. Never paid so much money for a phone
  charger.
</Callout>

## My Light

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'XIAOMI Mi Computer Monitor Light Bar',
    price: '47,34€',
    rating: 4.9,
    reviewCount: 85,
    href: 'https://www.banggood.com/XIAOMI-Mi-Computer-Monitor-Light-Bar-2_4GHz-wireless-Remote-Control-No-Screen-Reflection-Eyes-Protection-Ra95-USB-Lamp-Display-Hanging-Light-p-1983555.html?imageAb=2&utm_design=18&utm_click=6&utm_email=1684520921_3671_6&utm_source=emarsys&utm_medium=OrderConfirmReceipt&utm_campaign=trigger-logistics&utm_content=leander&sc_src=email_4320992&sc_eh=22761497749dcbbf1&sc_llid=11893603&sc_lid=180720778&sc_uid=vcK7dvB195&akmClientCountry=DE&a=1688239946.1302&cur_warehouse=CN&DCC=DE&currency=EUR&akmClientCountry=DE',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/2573677-n0.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'XIAOMI Mi Computer Monitor Light Bar',
    buttonLabel: "View on Banggood's Website",
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👍 Pros">
  Perfect for longer coding nights. No reflection from the monitor and neat looking wireless control
  for switching light warmth and intensity.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="👎 Cons">
  Hardly fits on big screens like the one, I recommended above, but it just barely works, although
  on smaller monitors the fit is probably even better.
</Callout>

title: Tech Stack 2024
metaDescription: Dive straight into the heart of my development process in this quick tour of my personal tech stack as of 2024.

body.raw:
# Tech Stack 2024

Dive straight into the heart of my development process in this quick tour of my personal tech stack as of 2024. Discover the languages, frameworks, and tools I use to bring ideas to life. Ready for a sneak peek into my digital toolkit? Let's get started!

### Frontend Framework: Next JS 13

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/LightMode_CreateNextApp.png"
  alt="Frontend Framework: Next JS 13"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🖥️">
  **Why:** Next.js provides a production-ready framework that's backed by a thriving community and a
  wealth of supportive content. It's the easiest way to build fast, SEO-optimized full-stack
  applications with React, offering the latest features such as Server Components.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🏃">
  **Runner Up:** [Svelte Kit](https://kit.svelte.dev/?ref=felixvemmer.com)
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/why-next-js" />

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Next.js 13 Docs"
  href="https://nextjs.org/docs?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Frontend Deployment: Vercel

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-06-30-at-14.06.47@2x.png"
  alt="Frontend Deployment: Vercel"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="⚙️">
  **Why:** Vercel provides the best developer experience, offering features like deployment
  previews, collaboration through comments, easy management of environment variables, and a
  user-friendly CLI. It's the top choice for developers seeking an efficient, seamless process for
  building and deploying modern websites and applications.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Vercel Deployment Starter"
  href="https://vercel.com/new?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Python Deployment: Modal

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.13.52@2x.png"
  alt="Python Deployment: Modal"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🐍">
  **Why:** With just a simple decorator, Modal can turn any function into a web-hook or serverless
  function. Coupled with great logs and easy debugging, it provides an overall superb developer
  experience. The super-helpful community, excellent documentation, and best real-world use examples
  further contribute to making Modal an essential tool for modern development.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Modal Docs"
  href="https://modal.com/docs/guide?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### General Deployment/Self Hosting: Railway

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.16.09@2x.png"
  alt="General Deployment/Self Hosting: Railway"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🚀">
  **Why:** Railway offers an extensive collection of useful templates for popular open-source
  products and frameworks. With out-of-the-box features like CI/CD integration with GitHub,
  streamlined management of environment variables, and secure URLs complete with SSL certificates,
  Railway simplifies the deployment process. It's designed to enhance and streamline your
  development experience, providing everything you need to easily deploy software.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Railway Docs"
  href="https://railway.app/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Relational DB Provider: Neon

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-21.59.20@2x.png"
  alt="Relational DB Provider: Neon"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🐘">
  **Why:** Database branching is not only a time-saver but also a powerful tool for testing any
  database change with real production data. Combined with serverless Postgres, which scales
  efficiently and ensures that you only pay for what you use, these features make database
  management more accessible and cost-effective than ever before.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🏃">
  **Runner Up:** [Supabase](https://supabase.com/?ref=felixvemmer.com)
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Neon Docs"
  href="https://neon.tech/docs/introduction?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Payment Processing: Lemon Squeezy

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.00.28@2x.png"
  alt="Payment Processing: Lemon Squeezy"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="💸">
  **Why:** As a merchant of record, LemonSqueezy takes care of the tax compliance burden, allowing
  me to focus on building the product. Plus, with standout features like the affiliate hub and email
  marketing, LemonSqueezy stands out as my preferred payment processor.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🏃">
  **Runner Up:** [Stripe](https://stripe.com/en-de?ref=felixvemmer.com)
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/lemon-squeezy-nextjs-payment-integration-guide" />

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Lemon Squeezy Docs"
  href="https://www.lemonsqueezy.com/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Analytics: PostHog

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.02.16@2x.png"
  alt="Analytics: PostHog"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🦔">
  **Why:** PostHog is the all-in-one analytics solution that effortlessly stitches together
  identified and anonymous users across sessions, delivering core product metrics with minimal
  setup. It's my preferred solution for making data-driven decisions, enabling me to continuously
  enhance and improve products based on accurate and insightful data.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🏃">
  **Runner Up:** [Plausible.io](https://plausible.io/?ref=felixvemmer.com)
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/unlocking-power-of-data-with-posthog-for-saas-success" />

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Posthog Docs"
  href="https://www.felixvemmer.com/tech-stack/Post%20Hog%20Docs"
/>

### Customer Support: Plain

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.10.22@2x.png"
  alt="Customer Support: Plain"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="💬">
  **Why:** Plain is incredibly easy to integrate with native React components, offering an amazing
  API to build and display the customer data that matters most to you. Its simplicity and
  functionality make it an essential tool for offering the best customer support.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Plain Docs"
  href="https://www.plain.com/docs?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Feature Requests: Canny.io

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.11.36@2x.png"
  alt="Feature Requests: Canny.io"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="⭐">
  **Why:** Canny is the go-to solution for easy and organized feature requests, offering a simple UI
  and setup. With the single sign-on feature, customers can effortlessly upvote or add new feature
  requests without the need to create a new account. It streamlines the process of gathering and
  managing feedback, making it a valuable tool for enhancing your product.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Canny Landing Page"
  href="https://canny.io/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Authentication: Clerk.dev

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.03.57@2x.png"
  alt="Authentication: Clerk.dev"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🔒">
  **Why:** Clerk.dev delivers super-fast authentication on the edge, providing an excellent
  developer experience with an array of amazing features. These include JWT Templates, Custom
  Session Tokens, User Impersonation, and Fully Customizable Components. It's a comprehensive
  solution designed to meet modern authentication needs with efficiency and flexibility.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🏃">
  **Runner Up:** [Supabase
  Authentication](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth?ref=felixvemmer.com)
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/supabase-vs-clerk-dev-user-authentication-comparison" />

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Clerk Docs"
  href="https://clerk.com/docs?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Styling: Tailwind CSS & Tailwind UI

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-07-01-at-15.21.20@2x.png"
  alt="Styling: Tailwind CSS & Tailwind UI"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🎨">
  **Why:** Tailwind CSS offers utility-first styling for rapid, responsive design, while Tailwind UI
  provides a rich set of well-crafted components. Together, they enable developers to create
  professional-grade websites with less effort, offering great customization and efficiency. It's an
  appealing choice for those looking to streamline their design process without sacrificing quality.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="TailwindCSS Docs"
  href="https://tailwindcss.com/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### UI Libraries:

#### Shadcn/UI

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-07-01-at-15.22.35@2x.png"
  alt="UI Libraries: Shadcn/UI"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🧱">
  **Why:** Shadcn UI offers beautifully designed, accessible components that can be easily copied
  and pasted into your apps, with the added flexibility of customization. Not only are these
  components open source, but they also provide guidance on building super modular and reusable
  components. It's an ideal solution for developers seeking both aesthetic appeal and educational
  value in their design process.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="shadcn/ui Docs"
  href="https://ui.shadcn.com/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

#### Daisy UI

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-19.22.36@2x.png"
  alt="Daisy UI"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🎨">
  **Why:** DaisyUI provides beautiful color palettes and well-crafted pre-designed components,
  including avatars, inputs, and more. With its user-friendly interface, it's super easy to switch
  and customize themes, allowing for creative flexibility and a streamlined design process. It's an
  appealing choice for developers seeking both aesthetic quality and ease of use.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="dasiyUI Docs"
  href="https://daisyui.com/docs/install/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Data Validation: Zod

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.19.11@2x.png"
  alt="Data Validation: Zod"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🔍">
  **Why:** Zod offers a TypeScript-first approach to schema declaration and validation, providing an
  intuitive and type-safe way to ensure data integrity. With comprehensive error messages and
  effortless integration with popular frameworks, it simplifies the validation process.
</Callout>

<LinkButton className="mb-12 mt-2" label="Zod Docs" href="https://zod.dev/?ref=felixvemmer.com" />

### Form Library: React-Hook-Form

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-06-30-at-14.08.31@2x.png"
  alt="Form Library: React-Hook-Form"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="📝">
  **Why:** Zod's integration with libraries like React Hook Form through the use of resolvers offers
  a seamless experience for form validation. By combining Zod's type-safe schema validation with the
  efficiency of custom resolvers, developers can create robust and maintainable forms with ease.
  This integration simplifies complex validation requirements, making it a go-to solution for those
  aiming to enhance both development speed and product reliability.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Form Builder Demo"
  href="https://react-hook-form.com/form-builder?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Form Inputs: React Select

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-19.24.50@2x.png"
  alt="Form Inputs: React Select"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🤏">
  **Why:** React Select is the easiest way to create flexible and customizable dropdown select menus
  in your React applications. With its rich set of features, including multi-select, search
  functionality, and easy theming, it provides a streamlined user experience without sacrificing
  style or functionality. It's an ideal choice for developers seeking to implement sophisticated
  select controls with minimal effort.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="React Select Docs"
  href="https://react-select.com/home?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### Table Library: TanStack Table

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-06-30-at-14.10.35@2x.png"
  alt="Table Library: TanStack Table"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="📄">
  **Why:** React Table is a highly flexible and customizable library for building and managing
  tables in React applications. With features like sorting, filtering, pagination, and resizable
  columns, it provides an efficient way to handle large datasets without compromising performance.
  It's an excellent choice for developers who need to create interactive and dynamic tables with
  ease, offering both functionality and adaptability in one package.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Tanstack Table Docs"
  href="https://tanstack.com/table/v8/docs/guide/introduction?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### ORM: Drizzle-ORM & Drizzle Kit

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-07-01-at-15.26.19@2x.png"
  alt="ORM: Drizzle-ORM & Drizzle Kit"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🤯">
  **Why:** Drizzle stands out as the best ORM for interacting with any relational database, offering
  a seamless experience with features like Drizzle Kit for pushing and migrating changes, and
  Drizzle Studio for data editing. With its SQL-like syntax and full type-safety for returned data,
  it provides the best devloper experience for anyone interacting with databases.
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/drizzle-orm-boosting-developer-productivity" />

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="Drizzle Landing Page"
  href="https://orm.drizzle.team/?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>

### LLMs: Vercel AI SDK

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-07-01-at-15.28.40@2x.png"
  alt="LLMs: Vercel AI SDK"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="🤖">
  **Why:** Vercel AI SDK is the easiest way to integrate AI features from LLMs, providing superb
  user experiences through streaming responses over the Vercel edge network. By enabling real-time
  interaction and responsiveness, it offers a seamless way to enhance applications with cutting-edge
  AI capabilities.
</Callout>

<RelatedPostCard slug="/en/blog/streaming-objects-vercel-ai-sdk-guide" />

<LinkButton className="mb-12 mt-2" label="Vercel AI SDK Docs" href="https://sdk.vercel.ai/docs" />

### Rate Limiting: Upstash

<Image
  className="my-4 rounded-lg"
  src="/pages/tech-stack/CleanShot-2023-08-01-at-22.08.15@2x.png"
  alt="Rate Limiting: Upstash"
  width={800}
  height={600}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="✋">
  **Why:** The Upstash Rate Limiting SDK provides an effortless solution for safeguarding your
  application from DDOS attacks and preventing the abuse or overwhelming of resources. It's a
  streamlined approach to security that emphasizes both reliability and simplicity, making it a top
  choice for maintaining optimal performance.
</Callout>

<LinkButton
  className="mb-12 mt-2"
  label="ratelimit GitHub Repo"
  href="https://github.com/upstash/ratelimit?ref=felixvemmer.com"
/>
